item.description: <p>Saw them live at the Edinburgh Festival. The Ryponol song in particular...<br/><br /><br/><br />Recommended.<br/><br /><br/><br />Smart. Satirical. Funny. Help people get better.<br/><br /><br/><br />Everything that the George W Shrub administration isnt..<br/><br /><br/><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br/><br /><br/><br />---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
Saw them live at the Edinburgh Festival. The Ryponol song in particular…

Recommended.

Smart. Satirical. Funny. Help people get better.

Everything that the George W Shrub administration isnt..

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

—* Bill
